author: rhs
msg: added frame-end back as a temporary workaround for C++; added a timeout to the hello-010-world session open

author: pauls
msg: Turns out our LDAP filter is not reentrant - but it is easy to fix - so this patch should make it work. It is needed because filter evaluations can call out to keys being compared which might in turn use the given thread to evaluate their own filter.

author: smishura
msg: Combine build.xml & scripts/main.xml into one file
